solution_line_template: Juan pays {num_tires}*{repair_cost_per_tire} = <<{num_tires}*{repair_cost_per_tire}={total_repair_cost}>>{total_repair_cost} dollars for all four tire repairs.
Juan pays {sales_tax_per_tire}*{num_tires} = <<{sales_tax_per_tire}*{num_tires}={total_sales_tax}>>{total_sales_tax} dollars in sales tax for all four tire repairs.
Juan pays a total of {total_repair_cost}+{total_sales_tax} = <<{total_repair_cost}+{total_sales_tax}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} dollars.
